content: Your line is open. Just to put that in perspective on the $1.250 billion that we did and was included in the press release, that was done more than 100 basis points tighter than where you would do those today on $1.250 billion, you can do the simple math, 100 basis points of $1.250 billion over the course of several years, that's a lot of money, well worth a couple of basis points.
